ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Melody of Ervaj
ygData.msgSnippet: well the short answer is don t bother, the song is a serious waste of a memmed slot.  it can drop off lots of different things, like dragons in Western Wastes.
ygData.messageBody:
well the short answer is don't bother, the song is a serious waste of a
memmed slot. it can drop off lots of different things, like dragons in
Western Wastes. i really wouldn't pay much for it, since you will likely
never use it unless it is changed in some way.

Shada

> I took a break from EQ just before SoV came out and I just recently
> started playing a lot again. Well, during the break I was a little
> out of the loop so I have a couple of questions regarding this song.
> First off, I know that this is a mob dropped spell in Velious. What
> zones/mobs is it most commonly found on? And... What are people
> paying/charging for this song?
>
> Please help, thanks ;)
>
> ~Beatdrop Battledrum
> 51st Minstrel of the Karana Server
